params.validator: Address of validator to delegate to

params.metadata: IPFS hash for additional validator info

params.reason: Slashing reason (1: double sign, 2: downtime, 3: invalid block)

params.validator: Address of validator to undelegate from

params.proof: Proof of key ownership (signed with old key)
